context.p: To install the base Windows operating system (OS):

step.cmd: Create a new VM using the VMware vSphere Client following the standard VMware procedures.

info.note: Make sure that the Windows VM uses the LSI Logic Parallel driver as the SCSI controller. For some Windows versions, it is not the default SCSI controller in the VM setting.

step.cmd: Install the Windows OS following standard VMware procedures.
